[Speech of the Mammoth Lords](/Feats.aspx?ID=3447) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=144" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Pathfinder #177: Burning Tundra](/Sources.aspx?ID=116) pg. 78

**Archetype** [Mammoth Lord](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=170)

**Prerequisites**
[Mammoth Lord Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3443); Master in [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6); Master in [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7)

</column>

---

You've learned the ancient tongue spoken by the creatures of the far north. You can ask questions of, receive answers from, use the [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) skill with, and [Coerce](/Actions.aspx?ID=52) megafauna. In most cases, megafauna of the Realm of the Mammoth Lords will hear you out.
